body:
TAKE A JOURNEY TO 1927 AS WE REVISIT THE HISTORIC CYCLONE. THIS ROLLERCOASTER, DEVELOPED BY THE ROSENTHAL BROTHERS, JACK AND IRVING, REPRESENTS A THRILL-SEEKING RELIC MORE EXHILARATING THAN ANY IMAGINARY ADVENTURE. THE CYCLONE, AN EVOLUTION FROM THE 1884 SWITCHBACK RAILWAY, HAS BEEN PROVIDING THRILL-SEEKERS WITH HEART-STOPPING TURNS AND DROPS FOR MANY GENERATIONS. BY 1988, IT EARNED ITS STATUS AS A NEW YORK CITY LANDMARK, STANDING PROUDLY ALONGSIDE THE STATUE OF LIBERTY AND TOWERING SKYSCRAPERS. 

PRESENTLY, THE CYCLONE STANDS ALONE ON CONEY ISLAND, A TESTAMENT TO ROLLERCOASTER HISTORY. WITH ITS WOODEN DESIGN MEANT TO LAUNCH THREE 4,000-POUND CARS DOWN AN 85-FOOT DROP AT A SWIFT 60MPH, THE CYCLONE OFFERS A TRULY REMARKABLE RIDE. ITS DEBUT SAW THE FRONT CAR RECEIVE A TRADITIONAL EGG CREAM BLESSING FROM BROOKLYN'S PRESIDENT, AND THE FIRST 100 RIDERS EXPERIENCED AN UNPARALLELED ADVENTURE. AN INTRIGUING ANECDOTE SUGGESTS THAT FAMED AVIATOR CHARLES LINDBERGH CLAIMED THE CYCLONE WAS MORE THRILLING THAN HIS SOLO ATLANTIC FLIGHT. THE TRUTHFULNESS OF THIS STORY REMAINS UNKNOWN BUT ADDS AN ELEMENT OF INTRIGUE TO THE CYCLONE'S CAPTIVATING HISTORY.

title: BROOKLYN'S CYCLONE: A HISTORIC RIDE

body:
HOLD ONTO YOUR SPATULAS, FOLKS! WE'VE GOT A VEGGIE TART HERE THAT'S READY TO BLOW YOUR MIND, WITH A CRUST THAT'S NOT JUST CRISPY, BUT CRISPY! FRESH FROM THE WILDS OF NORTHERN VERMONT, WHERE THE SUN'S JUST POKING ITS HEAD OUT AFTER A LONG WINTER'S NAP. OUR HERO, THE VEGGIE TART, STANDS READY FOR THE ARRIVAL OF SPRING, LIKE A CULINARY GROUNDHOG!


WHAT'S THAT? THE TART IS TALKING! "I'M PACKING A PUNCH WITH LEEKS AND ASPARAGUS THAT ARE SO TENDER, THEY’LL MELT IN YOUR MOUTH! I'VE GOT SOME NUTTY FONTINA AND TANGY GOAT CHEESE TO JAZZ THINGS UP!"


BUT THE BREAKOUT STAR HERE FOLKS? THE CRUST! A SMASHED POTATO CRUST! THAT’S RIGHT, WE TOOK THOSE SPUDS ON A ROLLERCOASTER RIDE, PAR-COOKING THEM IN WATER MIXED WITH SALT AND BAKING SODA, BEFORE SMASHING THEM INTO A TART PAN GREASED WITH ENOUGH OIL TO LUBRICATE A MONSTER TRUCK.


THEN, INTO THE OVEN IT GOES, BOTTOM RACK, BECAUSE WE DON'T PLAY GAMES WITH OUR FOOD - WELL, EXCEPT FOR THE SMASHING PART - THAT WAS FUN. FORTY MINUTES LATER, WHAT COMES OUT? A CRUST THAT'S GOT CRISP. IT'S GOT CRUNCH. IT'S GOT GOLDEN BROWN GOODNESS!


THE FILLING'S A DELECTABLE GARDEN PARTY OF SAUTÉED LEEKS, ASPARAGUS, GARLIC, AND THYME, LAYERED OVER OUR SUPERSTAR CRUST. THEN WE ADD A SPRINKLE OF GOAT CHEESE, A SHOWER OF FRESH HERBS, AND A CREAMY EGG CUSTARD THAT TIES THE WHOLE ROOM TOGETHER.


WE BAKE IT AGAIN UNTIL THE CUSTARD DOES ITS JIGGLE DANCE AND VOILA! LET IT REST, SLICE IT UP, AND SERVE IT WITH A DOLLOP OF SOUR CREAM! GET READY, FOLKS - YOUR TASTE BUDS WON'T KNOW WHAT HIT 'EM!

title: POTATO-POWERED VEGGIE TART EXTRAVAGANZA!

body:
<!DOCTYPE HTML PUBLIC "-//W3C//DTD HTML 4.0//EN" "HTTP://WWW.W3.ORG/TR/REC-HTML40/STRICT.DTD">

<HTML><HEAD><META NAME="QRICHTEXT" CONTENT="1" /><META CHARSET="UTF-8" /><STYLE TYPE="TEXT/CSS">

P, LI { WHITE-SPACE: PRE-WRAP; }

HR { HEIGHT: 1PX; BORDER-WIDTH: 0; }

LI.UNCHECKED::MARKER { CONTENT: "\2610"; }

LI.CHECKED::MARKER { CONTENT: "\2612"; }

</STYLE></HEAD><BODY STYLE=" FONT-FAMILY:'SEGOE UI'; FONT-SIZE:9PT; FONT-WEIGHT:400; FONT-STYLE:NORMAL;">

<P STYLE=" MARGIN-TOP:12PX; MARGIN-BOTTOM:12PX; MARGIN-LEFT:0PX; MARGIN-RIGHT:0PX; -QT-BLOCK-INDENT:0; TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">"GHOST IN THE SHELL: 2026 – IT'S CONCEPT ART GALORE. BIG SHOCKER, IT LOOKS A LOT LIKE THE ORIGINAL MANGA. THAT'S... REFRESHING, I GUESS? <BR /><BR />WE GOT A NEW TEASER, FOLKS, COURTESY OF THE GHOST IN THE SHELL WEBSITE. THE BIG REVEAL? SAME PEOPLE INVOLVED AS BEFORE. LOOK, THERE'S THE SCOTT PILGRIM GUY AND THE DANDADAN CHAMP. NETFLIX MUST BE THRILLED.<BR /><BR />HAND-DRAWN STORYBOARDS? CHECK. KEY ANIMATION THAT SCREAMS 'VINTAGE MANGA'? CHECK. IS IT A RERUN OF THE FIRST TEASER? MAYBE. IS IT BETTER THAN THE SCARLETT JOHANSSON LIVE-ACTION FIASCO? UNDOUBTEDLY.<BR /><BR />MOKO-CHAN'S DIRECTING, ENJOE TOH'S SCRIPTING, SHUHEI HANDA'S DESIGNING AND ANIMATING – IT'S THE DREAM TEAM, OR SO THEY TELL US. 2026 IS THE PROMISED YEAR. WILL IT BE ON NETFLIX US? WHO KNOWS. THE SUSPENSE IS KILLING US. <BR /><BR />AND THAT’S ALL FOLKS! NOW, BACK TO YOUR REGULARLY SCHEDULED DISILLUSIONMENT."</P></BODY></HTML>
rewrite:
"GHOST IN THE SHELL: 2026 – IT'S CONCEPT ART GALORE. BIG SHOCKER, IT LOOKS A LOT LIKE THE ORIGINAL MANGA. THAT'S... REFRESHING, I GUESS? 

WE GOT A NEW TEASER, FOLKS, COURTESY OF THE GHOST IN THE SHELL WEBSITE. THE BIG REVEAL? SAME PEOPLE INVOLVED AS BEFORE. LOOK, THERE'S THE SCOTT PILGRIM GUY AND THE DANDADAN CHAMP. NETFLIX MUST BE THRILLED.

HAND-DRAWN STORYBOARDS? CHECK. KEY ANIMATION THAT SCREAMS 'VINTAGE MANGA'? CHECK. IS IT A RERUN OF THE FIRST TEASER? MAYBE. IS IT BETTER THAN THE SCARLETT JOHANSSON LIVE-ACTION FIASCO? UNDOUBTEDLY.

MOKO-CHAN'S DIRECTING, ENJOE TOH'S SCRIPTING, SHUHEI HANDA'S DESIGNING AND ANIMATING – IT'S THE DREAM TEAM, OR SO THEY TELL US. 2026 IS THE PROMISED YEAR. WILL IT BE ON NETFLIX US? WHO KNOWS. THE SUSPENSE IS KILLING US. 

AND THAT’S ALL FOLKS! NOW, BACK TO YOUR REGULARLY SCHEDULED DISILLUSIONMENT."
title: "SCIENCE SARU: GHOST IN THE SHELL SERIES TEASER – DÉJÀ VU?"

body:
The controversy that started with UFC combatant Bryce Mitchell's endorsement of Adolf Hitler culminated in his submission at UFC 314. Jean Silva secured a win by compelling Mitchell to concede with a ninja choke in the second round of the primary card in Miami on Saturday. 

The contest almost concluded in the opening round when an unsuccessful takedown attempt by Mitchell seemed to set up a solid guillotine for Silva. However, Mitchell eventually navigated his way out of the hold. Silva, seizing another opportunity early in the second round, delivered a substantial hit, leading to the end moments later.

Mitchell stirred controversy beyond the UFC when he voiced his approval for Hitler on his podcast, without reservation. His remarks attracted criticism from many quarters, including UFC CEO Dana White, who generally avoids intervening in his fighters' public comments. White labeled Mitchell's comments as among the most ignorant he'd encountered, blaming the internet and social media for giving a platform to such voices.

Despite the controversy, White allowed Mitchell into the Octagon on Saturday. Mitchell later apologized, clarifying he was "definitely not a Nazi."

Silva capitalized on the negative publicity going into the fight, instigating anti-Mitchell chants at a press conference and unsettling his adversary to the point of losing sleep. For the UFC, this drama served as a marketing tool, generating increased attention for a primary card fight between two lower-ranked UFC featherweight contenders.

Details on UFC 314's results and highlights can be found here.

Details on UFC 314's results and highlights can be found here.
title: UFC 314 Outcome: Jean Silva Claims Victory Over Bryce Mitchell in Controversial Match

body:
JONATHAN MCDOWELL, A DISTINGUISHED FIGURE IN ASTROPHYSICS, IS RETIRING FROM HIS LONGSTANDING ROLE AT THE HARVARD-SMITHSONIAN CENTER FOR ASTROPHYSICS. MCDOWELL, WHO HAS LED NASA'S CHANDRA X-RAY OBSERVATORY SCIENCE DATA SYSTEMS SINCE 1988, IS WELL-REGARDED GLOBALLY FOR HIS COMPREHENSIVE MONTHLY SPACE REPORTS. 

FOLLOWING 37 YEARS OF SERVICE TO THE CENTER, MCDOWELL PUBLICIZED HIS RETIREMENT AND FUTURE PLANS TO RELOCATE TO BRITAIN. HE ATTRIBUTES HIS DECISION TO SHIFTS IN POLICY AND FINANCIAL PRESSURES ON THE FEDERAL SCIENCE BUDGET SINCE PRESIDENT TRUMP'S TENURE.

BORN A DUAL CITIZEN OF THE U.S. AND BRITAIN, MCDOWELL’S NEXT PHASE WILL CENTER ON DOCUMENTING SPACE EXPLORATION EVENTS. HIS LIFELONG FASCINATION WITH SPACE, SEEDED BY EARLY EXPERIENCES SUCH AS THE APOLLO PROGRAM AND DOCTOR WHO, WAS NURTURED WITHIN HIS FAMILY OF PHYSICISTS AND FURTHER HONED AT CAMBRIDGE UNIVERSITY.

IN A RECENT DISCUSSION WITH THE NEW YORK TIMES, MCDOWELL REFLECTED ON HIS PASSION FOR SPACE, FUTURE PLANS, AND THE EVOLUTION OF SPACE EXPLORATION. HE VIEWS THE INCREASING ACCESSIBILITY OF SPACE THROUGH CHEAPER SATELLITES AND THE GROWING NUMBER OF PARTICIPANTS IN THE SECTOR AS SIGNIFICANT CHANGES.

MCDOWELL ALSO PLANS TO CONTRIBUTE TO THE UK'S PUSH FOR SPACE SUSTAINABILITY. HE MAINTAINS A ROBUST CATALOGUE OF SPACE DEBRIS AROUND THE SUN AND BELIEVES THIS ISSUE NEEDS MORE CONSIDERATION FROM SPACE AGENCIES. HIS PASSION FOR DOCUMENTING SPACE PROJECTS AND MAINTAINING A COMPREHENSIVE RESOURCE LIBRARY REFLECTS HIS GOAL TO PRESERVE INFORMATION FOR FUTURE GENERATIONS STUDYING THIS PIVOTAL PERIOD IN SPACE EXPLORATION HISTORY.

title: MCDOWELL RESIGNS TO CHRONICLE SPACE

body:
In Context: Humor, Love Memes, Pick Up Lines, Sexual and Romantic Relationships 

Once, the parameters of a relationship status were straightforward – you were either single, in a relationship, or the situation was 'complicated'. 

Presently, the landscape has evolved into a vast cosmos of emotions, memes, misconceptions, online surveillance, and self-identification; a pandemonium in the digital realm. Let's explore the contemporary narrative of love entangled in miscommunication, the clutter of the internet and notably resonant memes for those navigating romantic entanglements in this digital era. 

The discussion is not limited to those in relationships. Individuals enjoying their single status may have a unique insight as well. 

You seem to have an existing subscription! Verify or upgrade to a lifetime pass HERE.

title: The Fluid Nature of Relationship Statuses in the Digital Age (Illustrated with 30 Photos)

body:
LICHENIFICATION, MARKED BY COARSE, DARKENED, AND THICKENED SKIN, IS USUALLY ASSOCIATED WITH CONDITIONS LIKE ECZEMA OR PSORIASIS, RATHER THAN AN ISOLATED CONDITION. IT'S DISTINGUISHED AS PRIMARY OR SECONDARY. PRIMARY LICHENIFICATION CAN BE INDUCED BY FACTORS LIKE STRESS, ANXIETY, OBSESSIVE-COMPULSIVE DISORDER, INSECT BITES, TIGHT CLOTHING, DRY SKIN, OR NERVE IRRITATION. SECONDARY LICHENIFICATION USUALLY DEVELOPS DUE TO AN EXISTING SKIN CONDITION THAT CAUSES ITCHING AND SCRATCHING. 

THE SYMPTOMS CAN VARY AMONG INDIVIDUALS DUE TO DIFFERING SKIN TONES. FOR EXAMPLE, THOSE OF ASIAN DESCENT MAY HAVE THICK, SCALY PLAQUES WITH DISTINCT BORDERS, WHILE THOSE WITH DARKER SKIN TONES MAY DISPLAY SHADES OF PURPLE, GRAY, OR DARK BROWN. 

REPEATED SCRATCHING OR RUBBING CAN LEAD TO LICHENIFICATION, CAUSING A VICIOUS CYCLE OF INCREASED ITCHING AND SKIN THICKENING, AND SUBSEQUENTLY, LONG-TERM CHANGES IN SKIN TEXTURE AND COLOR. LICHENIFICATION IS MORE PREVALENT AMONG PEOPLE WITH DARKER SKIN TONES, AS ECZEMA SYMPTOMS CAN BE LESS NOTICEABLE INITIALLY, RESULTING IN DELAYED TREATMENT AND INCREASING THE POSSIBILITY OF SEVERE ITCHING AND WIDESPREAD ECZEMA, HENCE MAKING IT TOUGH TO PREVENT LICHENIFICATION.

TO DIAGNOSE, HEALTHCARE PROVIDERS TYPICALLY EXAMINE THE SKIN, ASK ABOUT SYMPTOMS, TRIGGERS, AND FAMILY HISTORY, AND MAY ALSO ORDER CERTAIN TESTS. 

TREATMENT AIMS AT DISRUPTING THE ITCH-SCRATCH CYCLE TO ALLOW SKIN HEALING. IT CAN INCLUDE SKINCARE, TOPICAL TREATMENTS, AND OTHER MEDICATIONS. FOR DARKER SKIN, EARLY AND AGGRESSIVE TREATMENT MAY BE REQUIRED TO MANAGE SEVERE SYMPTOMS. 

LIVING WITH LICHENIFICATION CAN BE DIFFICULT, ESPECIALLY IF SKIN CHANGES AFFECT SELF-ESTEEM. HOWEVER, A PROPER SKINCARE ROUTINE AND ADHERENCE TO PRESCRIBED MEDICATION CAN HELP MANAGE ITCHING AND PROMOTE HEALING. 

TREATMENT AND TIME CAN SOFTEN THE THICK SKIN AND BRING IT BACK TO NORMAL, ALTHOUGH SOME COLOR OR TEXTURE CHANGES MIGHT REMAIN, ESPECIALLY IF THE LICHENIFICATION WAS LONG-STANDING BEFORE TREATMENT. IF YOUR SYMPTOMS AREN'T IMPROVING OR YOU'RE UNSURE WHAT'S CAUSING THEM, IT'S ADVISED TO CONSULT WITH A HEALTHCARE PROVIDER. THEY CAN HELP DEVISE OR REVISE YOUR CARE PLAN.

title: DEMYSTIFYING LICHENIFICATION: THICK, ROUGH SKIN

body:
STUNLOCK STUDIOS, THE CREATORS OF V RISING, HAVE UNVEILED A SIGNIFICANT UPDATE FOR THE GAME, INCLUDING NEW FEATURES AND COMBAT ADJUSTMENTS. THE UPDATE, LABELED "INVADERS OF OAKVEIL," IS SET TO LAUNCH BEFORE THE GAME'S FIRST ANNIVERSARY. 

THE COMPLIMENTARY UPGRADE INCORPORATES A NEW EXPLORABLE AREA, OAKVEIL WOODLANDS, WHERE THE IN-GAME CORRUPTION IS SPREADING. THE VILLAIN OF THIS UPDATE, MEGARA THE SERPENT QUEEN, IS BELIEVED TO BE THE SOURCE OF THE CORRUPTION, ALONGSIDE HER VENOMBLADES MINIONS. 

GAMEPLAY IMPROVEMENTS ENCOMPASS A NEW ARENA-BUILDING FEATURE IN YOUR CASTLE, NO-CONSEQUENCE DUELS IN THE WILDERNESS, AND THE ADDITION OF THREE NEW WEAPON TYPES: CLAWS, TWIN BLADES, AND THROWING DAGGERS. SEVEN NEW SPELLS ARE ALSO INTRODUCED. 

THE COMBAT SYSTEM UNDERGOES A SUBSTANTIAL REVAMP, INCLUDING CHANGES IN STATS, GEAR BALANCE TWEAKS, AND THE ADDITION OF NEW CUSTOMIZATION TOOLS. BLOOD TYPES AND PASSIVE SPELLS HAVE BEEN REDESIGNED FOR A MORE SIGNIFICANT IMPACT. 

ADDITIONAL CHANGES INCLUDE A MORE STRAIGHTFORWARD CRAFTING PROCESS, STABLES FOR HORSES, AND A SYSTEM FOR IMPRISONING CREATURES FOR BLOOD EXTRACTION. THESE CHANGES ARE OUTLINED IN DETAIL ON THE OFFICIAL GAME'S WEBSITE. 

THE GAME WILL ALSO OFFICIALLY SUPPORT STEAM DECK AS PART OF THE UPDATE, SET FOR RELEASE ON APRIL 28TH.

THE GAME WILL ALSO OFFICIALLY SUPPORT STEAM DECK AS PART OF THE UPDATE, SET FOR RELEASE ON APRIL 28TH.
title: V RISING REVEALS MAJOR UPDATE

body: DAY TWO OF COACHELLA WITNESSED AN INFLUENTIAL PERFORMANCE FROM WEEZER WHO INTRIGUED AUDIENCES FOR 45 MINUTES ON THE MOJAVE STAGE WITH A COLLECTION OF THEIR ACCLAIMED HITS. THEIR SET, BEGINNING WITH "MY NAME IS JONAS," INCLUDED FAN FAVORITES SUCH AS "SAY IT AIN'T SO," "BEVERLY HILLS," AND "ISLAND IN THE SUN," ALONG WITH A COVER OF METALLICA'S "ENTER SANDMAN," THRILLING THE CROWD. HOWEVER, A CLOUD OF CONTROVERSY SURROUNDED THEIR PERFORMANCE DUE TO THE RECENT ARREST OF JILLIAN LAUREN SHRINER, WIFE OF BASSIST SCOTT SHRINER, ON CHARGES OF ALLEGED ATTEMPTED MURDER IN A POLICE SHOOTOUT. UNFAZED, THE BAND GAVE A FORCEFUL PERFORMANCE AND IS SET TO APPEAR AT SEVERAL MORE FESTIVALS THIS YEAR INCLUDING GLASTONBURY, SOUNDSIDE, AND WHEN WE WERE YOUNG. A 2025 EUROPEAN TOUR WITH STOPS IN BERLIN, ZURICH, AND DUBLIN HAS ALSO BEEN ANNOUNCED. WEEZER CELEBRATED THE 30TH ANNIVERSARY OF THEIR DEBUT LP IN 2024, RELEASING A DELUXE VERSION OF THEIR SELF-TITLED PROJECT, ALSO KNOWN AS THE BLUE ALBUM, AND EMBARKED ON A CELEBRATORY BLUE TOUR WITH THE FLAMING LIPS AND DINOSAUR JR.
rewrite: DAY TWO OF COACHELLA WITNESSED AN INFLUENTIAL PERFORMANCE FROM WEEZER WHO INTRIGUED AUDIENCES FOR 45 MINUTES ON THE MOJAVE STAGE WITH A COLLECTION OF THEIR ACCLAIMED HITS. THEIR SET, BEGINNING WITH "MY NAME IS JONAS," INCLUDED FAN FAVORITES SUCH AS "SAY IT AIN'T SO," "BEVERLY HILLS," AND "ISLAND IN THE SUN," ALONG WITH A COVER OF METALLICA'S "ENTER SANDMAN," THRILLING THE CROWD. HOWEVER, A CLOUD OF CONTROVERSY SURROUNDED THEIR PERFORMANCE DUE TO THE RECENT ARREST OF JILLIAN LAUREN SHRINER, WIFE OF BASSIST SCOTT SHRINER, ON CHARGES OF ALLEGED ATTEMPTED MURDER IN A POLICE SHOOTOUT. UNFAZED, THE BAND GAVE A FORCEFUL PERFORMANCE AND IS SET TO APPEAR AT SEVERAL MORE FESTIVALS THIS YEAR INCLUDING GLASTONBURY, SOUNDSIDE, AND WHEN WE WERE YOUNG. A 2025 EUROPEAN TOUR WITH STOPS IN BERLIN, ZURICH, AND DUBLIN HAS ALSO BEEN ANNOUNCED. WEEZER CELEBRATED THE 30TH ANNIVERSARY OF THEIR DEBUT LP IN 2024, RELEASING A DELUXE VERSION OF THEIR SELF-TITLED PROJECT, ALSO KNOWN AS THE BLUE ALBUM, AND EMBARKED ON A CELEBRATORY BLUE TOUR WITH THE FLAMING LIPS AND DINOSAUR JR.
title: WEEZER TRIUMPHS AT COACHELLA AMIDST CONTROVERSY
